      • autoExpand

        public void autoExpand​(java.net.URI uri)
        Attempts to expand the job tree to the given folder.

        Note: This method often will need to be invoked using SwingUtilities.invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable) to ensure that the current tree modifications have completed before expanding.

        Parameters:
        uri - a URI containing the full path to the to the platform and path to expand

      • autoExpand

        public void autoExpand​(java.net.URI uri,
                       java.lang.Runnable finisher)
        Attempts to expand the job tree to the given folder.

        Note: This method often will need to be invoked using SwingUtilities.invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable) to ensure that the current tree modifications have completed before expanding.

        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the folder
        finisher - a Runnable that will be called on the swing event thread after the auto-expansion is completed successfully.

      • autoExpandJob

        public void autoExpandJob​(java.lang.String jobURL)
        Attempts to expand the job tree to the folder containing the given job
        Parameters:
        jobURL - a String containing the full URL to the job

      • autoExpandJob

        public void autoExpandJob​(java.lang.String jobURI,
                          java.lang.Runnable finisher)
        Attempts to expand the job tree to the folder containing the given job
        Parameters:
        jobURI - a String containing the full URL to the job
        finisher - a Runnable that will be called on the swing event thread after the auto-expansion is completed successfully.
